issue.title: Let contact manager process contacts even without subscribers

content.raw:
Should it be possible to disable processing while a subscriber is connected? If so, should the processing flag be re-set to `true` every time an additional subscriber connects?

The simplest behavior would be to force processing as long as a subscriber is connected, then have it revert to its original behavior once there are no more subscribers. It could then produce a warning if someone attempts to set the flag to false while subscribers are connected. Thoughts?
